entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
